overview.globalDesc: Present in over 30 countries with established sustainable partnerships
overview.trustedDesc: Guaranteed neutral and professional expertise with 95% success rate
overview.growthDesc: Over 500 active projects in 20 countries in less than a year

features.roleDescription: Facilitating trusted commercial transactions between Africa and the rest of the world.
features.neutralityDescription: Acting as neutral intermediaries to ensure fair and secure agreements.
features.commissionsDescription: Expertise in agricultural products, raw materials, and manufactured goods.
features.commitmentsSubtitle: Complete solutions for your international commercial exchanges
features.missionDescription: To provide a reliable and structured bridge between emerging African markets and international trade partners

services.title: Our services
services.subtitle: Complete and personalized solutions for your international commercial needs

cta.title: Need personalized support?
cta.subtitle: Contact us to discuss your specific needs and discover how we can help you.

mediation.title: Commercial Mediation
mediation.description: We facilitate the resolution of commercial conflicts and alignment of interests between partners. Our neutral expertise enables us to find win-win solutions in complex negotiations.

negotiation.title: B2B Negotiation
negotiation.description: We represent your interests in international negotiations, draft robust commercial agreements and conduct strategic negotiations to maximize your opportunities.

sourcing.title: Partner Sourcing
sourcing.description: We identify and connect the ideal commercial partners for your projects. Our extensive network and expertise in African markets guarantee quality connections.

intelligence.title: Market Intelligence
intelligence.description: We analyze markets, identify emerging opportunities and provide strategic insights to guide your international commercial decisions.

support.title: International Support
support.description: We accompany you in all logistical, customs and regulatory aspects of your international operations to ensure smooth and compliant execution.

sectors.title: Our business sectors
sectors.subtitle: Specialized in exchanges between Africa and the world

approach.title: A cross-cutting approach
approach.description: Our expertise extends to all economic sectors, with an integrated approach that combines mediation, negotiation and economic intelligence to maximize your opportunities.

whyChooseUs.title: Why choose us?
whyChooseUs.subtitle: Our expertise at the service of your commercial projects

presentationPage.subtitle: Discover our mission, values and approach to international commercial mediation
presentationPage.missionDescription: Medianeg International is a company specialized in commercial mediation and international negotiation, with a strategic focus on trade between Africa and the rest of the world. We facilitate trusted and efficient commercial transactions.
presentationPage.approachSubtitle: A proven methodology for sustainable results

analysis.title: In-depth analysis
analysis.description: We thoroughly analyze needs, markets and opportunities for each commercial project.

collaboration.title: Close collaboration
collaboration.description: We work in partnership with our clients to understand their specific objectives and challenges.

results.title: Measurable results
results.description: We focus on delivering concrete and measurable results for our partners.

actionPlanPage.subtitle: Discover our commercial strategy and vision for connecting African markets to international opportunities
actionPlanPage.timelineSubtitle: Key milestones in our international commercial development
actionPlanPage.objectivesSubtitle: The pillars of our international commercial growth
actionPlanPage.strategicObjectivesDesc: Develop our presence in new African and international markets to expand our network of commercial partners.
actionPlanPage.mediatorTrainingDesc: Intensify our activities in agricultural products, raw materials and manufactured goods with strategic partners.
actionPlanPage.operationalPlanningDesc: Improve our mediation and negotiation processes to ensure more secure and sustainable commercial agreements.
actionPlanPage.currentYearDescription: This year, we are focusing our efforts on strengthening our network of commercial partners, expanding our mediation services and improving our negotiation processes to offer even more effective solutions to our international clients.

stats.rapidGrowth: Exponential growth in less than a year

growth.title: Our exponential growth
growth.subtitle: Liberalization of agricultural markets and raw materials in CEMAC
growth.guineaGulfPartner: Dynamic partner of the Gulf of Guinea
growth.cemacExpansion: Rapid expansion in the CEMAC region
growth.localStrength: Our strength lies in our local expertise and sustainable partnerships
growth.description: Founded recently in 2025, MEDIANEG International has demonstrated rapid growth and exceptional market expansion. We focus on the liberalization of agricultural markets and raw materials in the Central African Economic and Monetary Community (CEMAC), with a particular focus on Cameroon.

achievements.title: Our achievements in one year
achievements.cemac: Strong presence in the CEMAC region

martinLibam.name: Martin Libam
martinLibam.quote: MEDIANEG has enabled us to establish sustainable partnerships with international suppliers. Their mediation expertise is exceptional.

cameroonContact1.name: Cameroon Contact 1
cameroonContact1.quote: Thanks to MEDIANEG, we were able to export our products with very favorable commercial conditions.

cameroonContact2.name: Cameroon Contact 2
cameroonContact2.quote: Their support in negotiating our export contracts was decisive for our success.

whoWeAre.subtitle: About MEDIANEG
whoWeAre.title: Your trusted partner in commercial mediation
whoWeAre.content: Founded in 2025, MEDIANEG International facilitates commercial exchanges between Africa and the world. Our expertise in mediation and negotiation allows us to create lasting bridges between companies and international markets.

mission.subtitle: Our Mission
mission.title: Promoting peace through trade
mission.content: We believe that fair trade and transparent mediation are the keys to sustainable development and lasting peace. Our mission is to facilitate these exchanges by creating value for all stakeholders.

neutrality.title: Neutrality
neutrality.description: Guaranteeing impartial mediation between all parties

expertise.title: Expertise
expertise.description: Deep knowledge of African and international markets

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Clear processes and open communication at every step

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Integration of new technologies into our services

testimonials.subtitle: Testimonials
testimonials.title: Our clients testify
testimonials.content: Discover how MEDIANEG has transformed the commercial projects of our clients and partners around the world. Their success is our greatest reward.

cta.title: Ready to transform your commercial projects?
cta.subtitle: Join the hundreds of companies that trust MEDIANEG for their international mediation and negotiation projects.
